question_text: Person 1: Is Water Shrinking Festival official ?
Person 2: No , most of the traditional festivals of the minority nationalities are not official .
Person 1: Dont you think these festivals are more interesting !
Person 2: What an idea !
Person 1: I ’ d like to talk to you for a second , please .
Person 2: Okay , Mark , What ’ s up ?
Person 1: I ’ d like to know why you ’ re always taking credit for work we ’ Ve done together like that line in the new Ice Cream ad ?
Person 2: That was my line , Mark . I know we worked on the ad together , but that was definitely my line .
Person 1: Do you like snakes ?
Person 2: Of course not . Im afraid of them .
Person 1: I mean , do you like snake meat ?
Person 2: Im afraid Ill feel sick at the sight of it .
Person 1: Does the material stand washing ?
Person 2: Sure.This material is not only washable but also unshrinkable , sun-resistant , crease-resistant , resilient .
Person 1: Is it drip-dry ?
Person 2: Yes , you have a good eye for materials .
Person 1: I dont think the lecture is very interesting .
Person 2: The lecturer is dull , too .
Person 1: I feel hes like a talking machine .
Person 2: I feel the same way .
